description: An Eastern Bloc agent who was invited to the haunted castle along with Odin and Freya. He is always calm, cool, and collected, and is never fazed, no matter what happens right in front of him. With his sharp mind and uncommonly good physical abilities, you could call him "the 009-1 of the Eastern Bloc". It is reaveled that he is 009-1`s younger brother, Paul. "Loki" is the name of a mischief-loving god who is the foster-brother of Odin in Norse mythology.
name: Loki
